items.question: How long does it take to build a website/app?
items.answer: Landing page: 1-2 weeks. Business website: 3-6 weeks. App: 6-12 weeks. Timelines vary based on project complexity.

items.question: What's included in the price?
items.answer: Design, development, revision rounds, and support (30-90 days depending on package). Hosting and domain not included but we'll help you set up.

items.question: Can I pay in installments?
items.answer: Yes. 50% upfront to start work, 50% on launch. For larger projects—can be split into 3 payments.

items.question: What if I'm not happy with the design?
items.answer: Unlimited revision rounds until you love the result. Your success is our success.

items.question: Do you help with content/copywriting?
items.answer: Yes, at additional cost. We have copywriters who specialize in marketing content. Or bring your own.

items.question: Do you work with international clients?
items.answer: Absolutely. We work with clients worldwide via Zoom, Slack, and digital tools. Time zones? We'll figure it out.
